answers.answer: My doctor has been screening me for blood pressure problems. She said to worry when its consistently over 165/105. Nausea is normal, I had it until 24 weeks. Headache is probably normal too, but if you're worried, ask at your next appt.

question: Nausea and headaches normal at 22 weeks ....my blood pressure was slightly high at 130 over 70 last time at the doctor.....my next doctors appt is in two weeks and I have Been doing reading which is worrying me into thinking that I have preeclampsia.....
title: nausea and headaches
